items.sentence: I'm glad that Tom and Mary are both on our team.
They say that Tom Jackson was born in Australia.
Boys tend to look down on their younger sisters.
I feel happiest when I'm at home with my family.
Tom said that he'd buy our extra ticket from us.
Since it was raining, we decided to stay inside.
What new French words have you learned recently?
I wonder whether or not Tom knows what Mary did.
That guy is always asking his parents for money.
Approximately how many French words do you know?
